q: these problems are correctable, Garcia insists. And time is on all these dogs' side. "Some say if a dog is bred to do something, you can't undo that," Garcia said. But to me, that's like saying if everyone in your family has always fought in a war, you're a warrior and you're destined to do this. Not true. Everyone's an individual. You can choose your own path in life. Same with dogs. The only difference is, they can't choose it.
